author: UltPanda
name: LoL
description: Comprehensive League of Legends integration using Riot Games API v5. Features include summoner lookup, match analysis, live game notifications, champion information, account linking, and performance statistics with intelligent rate limiting.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing the League of Legends cog! ðŸŽ®

**Setup Instructions:**
1. Get your Riot API key from https://developer.riotgames.com/
2. Set it with `[p]lolset apikey <your_key>`
3. Set a default region with `[p]lolset region <region>`
4. Test with `[p]lolset testapi`

Use `[p]help lol` to see all available commands!
short: Complete League of Legends integration with enhanced features
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user Discord IDs linked to League of Legends accounts, summoner lookup history, and notification preferences. Users can delete their data using Red's data deletion commands.
